title: Patti Smith Will Star in New Saint Laurent Campaign
text:
Patti Smith. Photo: Joe Quigg for Ray-Ban via Getty

Patti Smith, whose iconic Horses album cover has served as fashion editorial fodder for decades, will star in a glossy branding campaign of her own.

“Page Six” reports that the 72-year-old performer will appear in a forthcoming ad campaign for Saint Laurent, whose recent hires include Dua Lipa to promote fragrance and Keanu Reeves for menswear. Other musicians who have posed for the brand include Courtney Love, Daft Punk, Marilyn Manson, and Joni Mitchell.

A source told “Page Six” that the 2020 campaign will be shot in New York later this month. Steven Sebring, who shot Smith for the cover of a 1995 Spin magazine and has spent 11 year making a documentary about her life, will be Smith’s photographer. I guess he fits the job description pretty well then!
